originalText.text: Dr. Gattani is the best doctor I have ever had and I have had many in my life. She is brilliant, caring, and always responsive to my queries and needs. She and her staff make you feel comfortable and cared for. I had Chemotherapy in her infusion room six years ago  and continue to marvel at how lucky I was to find her.

text.text: Dr. Gattani is the best doctor I have ever had and I have had many in my life. She is brilliant, caring, and always responsive to my queries and needs. originalText.text: Dr. Gattani is a wonderful doctor. She takes excellent care of me, and she has also cared for my in-laws, both of whom were treated for cancer. I firmly believe that she added years to their lives. Dr. Gattani's meticulous attention to detail, and her extraordinary bedside manner (never rushed and always thoughtful), make her a unique physician in the world of managed care. The office is immaculate, and the staff are incredibly professional, accommodating, and kind.  I recommend Dr.Gattani without reservation.

originalText.text: Dr. Gattani is an incredibly compassionate and caring doctor. She has given excellent advice to several family members, all of whom have seen dramatic improvements to their condition after following Dr. Gattani's advice. One of her hallmark traits is her bedside manner: she spends substantial time with her patients, understands their questions, and addresses each one with careful consideration. Further, her office on the is exemplary, as each staff member goes out of their way to accommodate patients and family members navigating difficult situations.

originalText.text: Far and away the best of the best.....love working with Dr Gattani. Have been a patient of her's for more than 10 years and she and her team are the consummate professionals and I know my health remains their sole focus and priority. Getting infusions is never something any of us "wants" to do....but if that is what the doctors prescribe then Dr Gattani is where you want to have it done. I have tried the large infusion centers and they are not for me. I prefer the care and intimacy of Dr Gattani's practice. It is the closest thing imaginable to doing it in the privacy of your home - but actually a bit better because you are surrounded by an exemplary team of people. As long as she will see me, I will be there every six weeks for my infusion. Very appreciative of the chance to see her for my ongoing care.

originalText.text: Dr. Gattani is the most warm compassionate person.From the minute you walk into the office you feel secure Comfortable and you know you’re going to be well taken care of. I have been a patient of Dr. Gattani,s for almost 6 years and not once was a rushed.I can talk to her about anything that’s bothering me and she helps me. I call her my security blanket
